Transaction: Activated F Patrik Elias from injured reserve.
Assigned D Jesse Graham from Bridgeport (AHL) to Missouri (ECHL).
Assigned G Niklas Lundstrom from Bakersfield (AHL) to Norfolk (ECHL).
Reassigned D Stefan Elliott to Milwaukee (AHL).
Recalled D Brady Skjei from Hartford (AHL) and G Mackenzie Skapski from Greenville (ECHL) to Hartford.
Recalled F Justin Bailey from Rochester (AHL).
Recalled F Nikita Jevpalovs from Allen (ECHL) to San Jose (AHL).
Signed G Adin Hill to a three-year, entry-level contract.
Reassigned F Sergey Tolchinsky to Charlotte (AHL).
Recalled F Bryan Bickell from Rockford (AHL). Agreed to terms with F Tyler Motte on a three-year contract.
Recalled F Curtis McKenzie from Texas (AHL).
Recalled G Marek Langhamer from Springfield (AHL).
